queries.text:
// create a line chart of all temperature sensor values over time
//
SensorData
| join kind=inner Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(1h),'US/Pacific') 
| where unit has "C"
| where productType == "Footwear"
//| where productId == '{productId }'
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId
| extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
| summarize avgTemperature=avg(sensorValueReal) by bin(EventDateTime, 1s),sensorId,productId

// All Temp Values
//
SensorData
| join kind=inner Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(5m),'US/Pacific') 
| where unit has "C"
| where productType == "Footwear"
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId
| extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
| summarize avgTemperature=avg(sensorValueReal) by bin(EventDateTime, 1s)

// create a line chart of all temperature sensor values over time
//
SensorData
| join kind=inner Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(2m),'US/Pacific') 
| where unit has "C"
| where productType == "Footwear"
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId
| extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
| summarize avgTemperature=round(avg(sensorValueReal),4) by sensorId,productId

// create a line chart of all temperature sensor values over time
//
SensorData
| join kind=inner Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(10m),'US/Pacific') 
| where unit has "C"
| where productType == "Footwear"
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId
| extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
| summarize avgTemperature=round(avg(sensorValueReal),4)

// create a line chart of all humidity sensor values over time
//
SensorData
| join kind=inner Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(5m),'US/Pacific') 
| where unit has "%"
| where productType == "Footwear"
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId
| extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
| summarize avgTemperature=round(avg(sensorValueReal),4)

// All Temp Values
//
SensorData
| join kind=inner Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(2m),'US/Pacific') 
| where unit in ("C","%")
| where productType == "Footwear"
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId,unit
| extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
| summarize Sensor=avg(sensorValueReal) by bin(EventDateTime, 1s), unit

// Temp by Activity
//
SensorData
| join kind=inner Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| join kind=inner Material on materialId
| join kind=inner ActivitySession on sessionId
| join kind=inner ActivityType on activityTypeId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(30m),'US/Pacific') 
| where unit has "C"
| where productType == "Footwear"
| where materialName in ("ZavaMesh","SmartCotton","NeoWool","AirWeave","AeroPanel")
//| where productId == '{productId }'
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId, materialName, activityTypeName
| extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
| summarize avgTemperature=round(avg(sensorValueReal),0) by bin(EventDateTime, 1s),activityTypeName, materialName
| order by materialName asc

// drop comfort rating
//
SensorData
| join kind=inner Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| join kind=inner Material on materialId
| join kind=inner ActivitySession on sessionId
| join kind=inner ActivityType on activityTypeId
| join kind=inner PerformanceMetric on sessionId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(5m),'US/Pacific') 
| project EventDateTime, comfortScore, materialName
| extend sensorValueReal = todouble(comfortScore)
| summarize avgComfort=round(avg(sensorValueReal),3) by materialName
| order by avgComfort desc

SensorData
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(2m),'US/Pacific') 
| join kind=inner Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| where sensorType == 'Pressure' and locationOnProduct == 'Insole' and productType == 'Footwear'
| where sensorId in ("SEN0003","SEN0027", "SEN0051", "SEN0075", "SEN0099", "SEN0123")
| project productId,sensorId,todecimal(sensorValue)
| summarize avg(sensorValue) by sensorId
